definition: the design of a character (in games, manga etc) (abbr. for 人物設定|人物设定)/(fig.) (a celebrity or other public figure's) image in the eyes of the public/public persona
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display

sentences.english: The expert explained that the panda was trapped by someone.
sentences.chinese: 專家解釋說，那頭熊貓是被人設陷阱捕捉的。

definition: silly talk or "mo lei tau" (Cantonese), genre of humor emerging from Hong Kong late in the 20th century
imaginative/to have one's mind buzzing with ideas
handsome high-powered businessman (a type of character in an eponymous genre of romantic fiction who typically has a soft spot for a girl of lower social status)

dramatic form consisting of historical narration/history as jocular narrative/to stretch history for a joking story/amusing story with strained interpretations of history/to make an unreasonable comparison in jest
